meanings.definition: Past tense of forgive: to stop feeling angry or resentful towards someone for an offense, flaw, or mistake.
meanings.sent1: She forgave her friend for forgetting her birthday.
meanings.sent2: After some time, he forgave himself for the past mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The grumpy cat forgave the playful puppy for knocking over its food bowl.
meanings.sent4: The sun forgave the clouds for hiding its rays, shining brightly once they moved away.
meanings.sent5: Forgiving others not only helps them but also brings peace to oneself.
